general_page.description: Shows the specified page in general menu.

reload_database.description: Reloads the data related to the database.

economy_help.description: Shows the specified page in economy menu.

economy_add.description: Deposits the amount value to a user.

economy_take.description: Withdraws the amount value from the user.

economy_set.description: Sets amount value for the user.

economy_reset.description: Resets account balance for the user.

balance_others.description: Shows the specified player account balance.

bank.description: Shows current bank stats or help page.

bank_help.description: Shows the specified page in bank menu.

bank_create.description: Creates a bank with the specified name.

bank_deposit.description: Deposits the amount value to the bank.

bank_withdraw.description: Withdraws the amount value from the bank.

spawn_set.description: Sets the spawn location of the specified name.

warp_set.description: Sets the warp location of the specified name.

kit_create.description: Creates a kit using current inventory.

kit_remove.description: Deletes the kit with the specified name.

dealer_create.description: Creates a dealer in the current location.

dealer_remove.description: Removes the specified dealer by id.

gang.description: Shows current gang stats or help page.

gang_help.description: Shows the specified page in gang menu.

gang_create.description: Creates a gang with the specified name.

gang_display_name.description: Sets the display name of the gang.

gang_display_remove.description: Removes the display name of the gang.

gang_economy_deposit.description: Deposits the amount value to the gang.

gang_economy_withdraw.description: Withdraws the amount value from the gang.

gang_invite_player.description: Invites the player to the gang.

gang_kick_player.description: Kicks the player from the gang.

gang_rank_promote.description: Promotes the player to the next rank.

gang_rank_demote.description: Demotes the player to the previous rank.

gang_ally_request.description: Request alliances to the other gang.

safe_wand.description: Gives the player a safe wand.

weapons.description: Gives the player the specified weapon.

ammunition.description: Gives the player the specified ammo.

resource_pack.description: Downloads the resource pack to the user.

rank_help.description: Shows the specified page in ranks menu.

rank_create.description: Creates a new rank with the specified name.

rank_add_permission.description: Adds the permission to the specified rank.

rank_remove_permission.description: Removes the permission from the specified rank.

rank_info.description: Gives all the information about the specified rank.

bounty.description: Shows the current bounty or help menu.

bounty_help.description: Shows the specified page in bounty menu.

bounty_set.description: Sets a bounty on the player head.

level_help.description: Shows the specified page in level menu.

level_next.description: Shows statistics about the next level.

waypoint_help.description: Shows the specified page in waypoint menu.

waypoint_list.description: Shows a list of registered waypoints.

waypoint_create.description: Creates a new waypoint according to the current location.

waypoint_select.description: Selects the waypoint to easily configure.

waypoint_info.description: Shows a detailed information about the selected waypoint.

waypoint_type.description: Sets the specified waypoint with the specific type.

waypoint_gangId.description: Sets the gangId in that waypoint.

waypoint_timer.description: Sets the timer in that waypoint.

waypoint_shield.description: Sets the shield duration in that waypoint.

waypoint_cost.description: Sets the cost to teleport to that waypoint.

waypoint_radius.description: Sets the radius of affect for that waypoint.
